name: Razex T1 Fighter - Ship Controller Demo
name_original: Razex T1 Fighter - Ship Controller Demo
description:
Asset Store pacake is now updated! This package is now available for use with Unity3D to get you started!

If you buy the package on itch.io from us you will be eligible for a free download of the pack on the Unity Asset Store - Contact us for the Unity3D key!

A example demo to show how the ship controller, camera follow and weapons work in the Razex T1 Fighter on the unity asset store.

Razex T1 Fighter - Unity Asset Store

ATTENTION: These scripts are not included within the itch.io packages as of yet.
